## Subject class

Observable implementation that allows multiple observers to watch values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Subject<T>
```

## Methods

| Method                                                  | Modifiers | Description                             |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- |
| [next(value)](./utils.subject.next.md)                  |           | Sends a value to all Subject observers. |
| [subscribe(subscription)](./utils.subject.subscribe.md) |           | Subscribes to subject updates.          |
